profileText: a Representative from Colorado; born in Denver, Denver County, Colo., December 23, 1980; graduated from Northglenn High School, Northglenn, Colo., 1999; B.S., Regis University, Denver, Colo., 2003; M.D., University of Colorado, Aurora, Colo., 2009; pediatrician; union representative; campaign staff, presidential campaign of Barack H. Obama, 2008; member of the Colorado state house of representatives, 2019-2022; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress (January 3, 2023-present).
